data.name: Finger Fortress
data.detailed_description:
We fused typing and strategy to provide you the best experience of a 1v1 typing game. Choose your race and lead your soldiers to break through the opponent fortress in the fingers of speed and wisdom!

Features:

  • Innovative gameplay, fused typing and strategy. Constantly suppress opponents by paths select and accumulate more resource, call reasonable troops to restrain opponents, deep immersed to improve your typing speed.
  • Real-time battle. Tactics of every opponent are unique. In every battle, you will face tactical changes. Even if you have advantages at present, do not be careless.
  • Rich race selection. Familiar with the characteristics of each race, you can not only suppress the opponent easily, but also calmly help you predict the opponent's tactical strategy to balance your weakness of slowly typing speed .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7 Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
